title: Fruzion
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Burger place but has a soy burger and a lentil veggies burger (both patties are vegan) that come with a side of fries. Smoothie menu is clearly marked as half being 100% fruit, the other half containing dairy. Casual atmosphere with seating on 2 floors.
streetAddress: 2nd row from Malecon, Playa el Chaco
